Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/2/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $5,266,690 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1983, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/15/1985, off Silvio Barettes (TRO)...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/13/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
